values: curl up [phrasal verb]: to lie or sit with your back bent forward and with your legs pulled up close to your body蜷缩；蜷坐；蜷卧She curled up on the couch for a nap.她蜷缩在沙发上打盹儿。It's a good night to stay home and curl up with a book and a cup of tea.蜷坐在家里，有一本书和一杯茶相伴，这真是美好的夜晚。—see

curl up [phrasal verb]: to lie or sit with your back bent forward and with your legs pulled up close to your body蜷缩；蜷坐；蜷卧She curled up on the couch for a nap.她蜷缩在沙发上打盹儿。It's a good night to stay home and curl up with a book and a cup of tea.蜷坐在家里，有一本书和一杯茶相伴，这真是美好的夜晚。—see
